pages.text: When seasons is enabled, Crops grow only in certain seasons. $(br2)Hover over any crop seed to see when that specific crop grows.

Since bone meal is disabled in seasons (if enabled). There is another way to increase yield (by up to 300%) which is with manure and sulfur. $(br2)Check out the Crops category for more information. $(br)
Pumpkin is changed somewhat (if seasons is enabled). $(br2)Now it will grow 4 pumpkins before withering/resetting to age0.
Melon is changed somewhat (if seasons is enabled). $(br2)Now it will grow 4 melons before withering/resetting to age0.
